summary: The Safe Response Act (S. 2532) reauthorizes and modifies a first responder training program. It amends Section 546 of the Public Health Service Act related to the program. The bill removes specific mentions of "opioid" in various subsections and expands the scope to include other drugs in paragraph (2) and it updates funding levels for fiscal years 2026-2030. The bill seeks to improve training for first responders.
